title: When I attempt to switch to "Safe Mode" using the instructions provided, the option does not come up
content: The problem is my phone says my WiFi signal is excellent but I can't send or receive calls or text messages. The problem started all of a sudden with no previous issues ever. I have reset the router, turned phone off and on again many times, uninstalled apps and every other thing suggested. Also, Ican't turn my phone to "Safe Mode" following the instructions.
